rule-12-1-a.test_description: Space count in Baseline RMR = User RMR

standard.rule_description: Number of spaces modeled in User RMR and Baseline RMR are the same

rule-12-1-b.test_description: Space count in Baseline RMR > User RMR

standard.rule_description: Number of spaces modeled in User RMR and Baseline RMR are the same

rule-12-1-c.test_description: Space count in Baseline RMR < User RMR

standard.rule_description: Number of spaces modeled in User RMR and Baseline RMR are the same

rule-12-2-a.test_description: Space count in Proposed RMR = User RMR

standard.rule_description: Number of spaces modeled in User RMR and Proposed RMR are the same

standard.rule_description: Number of spaces modeled in User RMR and Proposed RMR are the same

rule-12-2-c.test_description: Space count in Proposed RMR < User RMR

standard.rule_description: Number of spaces modeled in User RMR and Proposed RMR are the same
